issue.title: Missed ad server
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

**NSFW** - https://turkifsaalemi.com/2022/07/18/universiteli-sevval-efsane-bol-videolu/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Turkish filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, EasyList

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

**Steps to reproduce**

1- Go to `https://turkifsaalemi.com/2022/07/18/universiteli-sevval-efsane-bol-videolu/` and click on the `mail.ru` link

https://i.imgur.com/YPs0GNl.png


2-It will direct you to `kisalt.digital.com` 

<details>
 <summary>Screenshot</summary>
 
![resim](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/109369779/179882970-3f2d8164-6719-4ca0-a31d-64cfcb2340b2.png)


</details>

3- Open DevTool and click `Preserve log` then click `İÇERİĞE GİT`. Go back to `kisalt.digital` and look at the network requests.

<details>
 <summary>Screenshot</summary>

![resim](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/109369779/179881804-897daba4-eb05-4301-b671-7f7175d3b83f.png)


</details>


4- When you click on the `İÇERİĞE GİT` button, an advertisement pop-up window will also open.

<details>
 <summary>Screenshot</summary>
 
![resim](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/109369779/179881089-2b97f0d1-efa0-49b2-b701-cc6d4f4694f7.png)


</details>

---

Advertising windows will not open when `pophit.net` is blocked.


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

labels.name: A: Problematic

issue.body:
Включите расширение AdGuard Extra в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить скрипт `AdGuard Extra`. Для этого понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. issue.title: Missing splitted filters for the "Report an issue" form.
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

These new splitted filters are missing for the "Report an issue" form. If the user enables one of them and tries to report a issue, they will not appear in the form. Only the "AdGuard Annoyances" filter appears in the form.

<details><summary>Screenshot</summary>

![Form](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35523759/180346872-6c5e98c1-8c2f-44d8-bca1-694902a9c441.png)
</details>

### Proposed solution

Add splitted filters (AdGuard Cookie Notices, Popups, Mobile App Banners, Other Annoyances and Widgets) to "Report an issue" form.

### Additional information

_No response_

issue.title: mail.yandex.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
### ВНИМАНИЕ

Пользователям программы для `Windows`, `macOS` или `Android` нужно включить расширение `AdGuard Extra` в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить [расширение AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra#how-to-install-adguard-extra) либо скрипт `AdGuard Extra`(этот вариант может не везде срабатыавать). 

<details><summary>Установка скрипта  "AdGuard Extra" в расширение "Tampermonkey"  :</summary>

Для установки скрипта понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

</details>

issue.title: bbc.co.uk
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin (1.43.0); AdGuard Annoyances filter (2.1.27.2)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Microsoft Edge

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. After viewing three BBC News pages, it displays a fullscreen sign in page.  It may not appear for people with IP addresses that are not in the UK, I don't know.  Steps to reproduce:

    **A)** Go to https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/business-62226912

    **B)** Go to https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology-62236778

    **C)** Go to https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/science-environment-62234196

    **D)** On the third page, it displays a fullscreen sign in page (see screenshot)


2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![Screesnshot A](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/27423064/179995478-bfec1cd6-bbd9-4930-ad52-1edccd349dd5.png)

</details>

3. Action
When manually adding the below rule to uBlock Origin, the sign in dialogue no longer appears, however it's not possible to scroll the page anymore.
```
bbc.co.uk##.e34ixc510.ssrcss-veoawf-Overlay
```
When manually adding either of the below rules as well, it's still not possible to scroll the page.
```
bbc.co.uk##html:style(overflow: visible !important;)
```
```
bbc.co.uk##:root:style(overflow-y: visible !important;)
```

4. Details

issue.title: opencritic.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://opencritic.com/game/11627/mario-party-superstars](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fopencritic.com%2Fgame%2F11627%2Fmario-party-superstars) ### Comment > AdGuard Popups filter breaks the ability to watch videos when tapping/clicking a video image in the Media section of a game’s page on opencritic.com. Instead of playing the video, the screen just turns a darker shade of gray. With the AdGuard Popups filter disabled, the video properly plays, so the culprit is definitely that filter. Please note however this is NOT truly a popup since it requires the user to select/tap a link to view the video first. In other words, the AdGuard Popups filter should not be blocking the ability to view the videos in this manner. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/UlkgJKA.jpg)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/x74wQ62.jpg)
